price: "E, não fora a graça de meu Senhor, seria dos trazidos ao Fogo.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walawlā niʿ'matu rabbī lakuntu mina al-muḥ'ḍarīna
